atk-abh02a12:2_0: 642. Idāni tadanantare appamaññāvibhaṅge catassoti gaṇanaparicchedo. Appamaññāyoti
atk-abh02a12:2_1: pharaṇaappamāṇavasena appamaññāyo. Etā hi ārammaṇavasena appamāṇe vā satte pharanti,
atk-abh02a12:2_2: ekasattampi vā anavasesapharaṇavasena pharantīti pharaṇaappamāṇavasena appamaññāyoti
atk-abh02a12:2_3: vuccanti. Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṁ sāsane bhikkhu. Mettāsahagatenāti mettāya samannāgatena.
atk-abh02a12:2_4: Cetasāti cittena. Ekaṁ disanti ekissā disāya. Paṭhamapariggahitaṁ sattaṁ upādāya
atk-abh02a12:2_5: ekadisāpariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena vuttaṁ. Pharitvāti phusitvā ārammaṇaṁ katvā.
atk-abh02a12:2_6: Viharatīti brahmavihārādhiṭṭhitaṁ iriyāpathavihāraṁ pavatteti. Tathā dutiyanti yathā
atk-abh02a12:2_7: puratthimādīsu disāsu yaṁ kiñci ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati, tatheva tadanantaraṁ
atk-abh02a12:3_0: Iti uddhanti teneva ca nayena uparimaṁ disanti vuttaṁ hoti. Adho tiriyanti adhodisampi
atk-abh02a12:3_1: tiriyaṁdisampi evameva. Ettha ca adhoti heṭṭhā, tiriyanti anudisā. Evaṁ sabbadisāsu
atk-abh02a12:3_2: assamaṇḍale assamiva mettāsahagataṁ cittaṁ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti ettāvatā ekamekaṁ
atk-abh02a12:3_3: disaṁ pariggahetvā odhiso mettāpharaṇaṁ dassitaṁ. Sabbadhītiādi pana anodhiso dassanatthaṁ
atk-abh02a12:3_4: vuttaṁ. Tattha sabbadhīti sabbattha. Sabbattatāyāti sabbesu hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhamittasapattamajjhattādippabhedesu
atk-abh02a12:3_5: attatāya ‘ayaṁ parasatto’ti vibhāgaṁ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṁ hoti; atha vā sabbattatāyāti
atk-abh02a12:3_6: sabbena cittabhāvena īsakampi bahi avikkhipamānoti vuttaṁ hoti. Sabbāvantanti sabbasattavantaṁ,
atk-abh02a12:4_1: vā ettha odhiso pharaṇe viya puna ‘tathā’saddo ‘iti’saddo vā na vutto, tasmā puna
atk-abh02a12:4_2: “mettāsahagatena cetasā”ti vuttaṁ; nigamanavasena vā etaṁ vuttaṁ. Vipulenāti ettha
atk-abh02a12:4_3: ca pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā. Bhūmivasena pana taṁ mahaggataṁ, paguṇavasena
atk-abh02a12:4_4: appamāṇaṁ, sattārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇaṁ, byāpādapaccatthikappahānena averaṁ, domanassappahānato
atk-abh02a12:4_5: abyāpajjhaṁ, niddukkhanti vuttaṁ hoti. Ayaṁ tāva “mettāsahagatena cetasā”tiādinā
atk-abh02a12:5_0: 643. Idāni yadetaṁ “kathañca, bhikkhave, mettāsahagatena cetasā”tiādinā nayena vuttaṁ
atk-abh02a12:5_1: padabhājanīyaṁ, tattha yasmā idaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ dosacaritassa sappāyaṁ, tasmā yathārūpe
atk-abh02a12:5_2: puggale ayaṁ mettā appanaṁ pāpuṇāti, taṁ mettāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ tāva dassetuṁ
atk-abh02a12:5_3: seyyathāpi nāma ekaṁ puggalantiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha seyyathāpi nāmāti opammatthe nipāto,
atk-abh02a12:5_4: yathā ekaṁ puggalanti attho. Piyanti pemanīyaṁ. Manāpanti hadayavuḍḍhikaraṁ. Tattha
atk-abh02a12:5_5: pubbeva sannivāsena paccuppannahitena vā piyo nāma hoti, sīlādiguṇasamāyogena manāpo
atk-abh02a12:5_6: nāma; dānasamānattatāhi vā piyatā, piyavacanaatthacariyatāhi manāpatā veditabbā.
atk-abh02a12:5_7: Yasmā cettha piyatāya imassa byāpādassa pahānaṁ hoti, tato mettā sukhaṁ pharati,
atk-abh02a12:5_8: manāpatāya udāsīnatā na saṇṭhāti, hirottappañca paccupaṭṭhāti, tato hirottappānupālitā
atk-abh02a12:5_9: mettā na parihāyati, tasmā taṁ upamaṁ katvā idaṁ vuttaṁ – piyaṁ manāpanti. Mettāyeyyāti
atk-abh02a12:5_10: mettāya phareyya; tasmiṁ puggale mettaṁ kareyya pavatteyyāti attho. Evamevasabbe
atk-abh02a12:5_11: satteti yathā piyaṁ puggalaṁ mettāyeyya, evaṁ tasmiṁ puggale appanāppattāya vasībhāvaṁ
atk-abh02a12:5_12: upagatāya mettāya majjhattaverisaṅkhātepi sabbe satte anukkamena pharatīti attho.
atk-abh02a12:6: 644.Vidisaṁ vāti padaṁ tiriyaṁ vāti etassa atthavibhāvanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:7: 645.Pharitvāti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena phusitvā. Adhimuñcitvāti adhikabhāvena muñcitvā, yathā muttaṁ sumuttaṁ hoti suppasāritaṁ suvitthataṁ tathā muñcitvāti attho.
atk-abh02a12:8: 648.Sabbadhiādiniddese yasmā tīṇipi etāni padāni sabbasaṅgāhikāni, tasmā nesaṁ ekatova atthaṁ dassetuṁ sabbena sabbantiādi vuttaṁ. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
atk-abh02a12:9_0: 650.Vipulādiniddese yasmā yaṁ appanāppattaṁ hutvā anantasattapharaṇavasena vipulaṁ,
atk-abh02a12:9_1: taṁ niyamato bhūmivasena mahaggataṁ hoti. Yañca mahaggataṁ taṁ appamāṇagocaravasena
atk-abh02a12:9_2: appamāṇaṁ. Yaṁ appamāṇaṁ taṁ paccatthikavighātavasena averaṁ. Yañca averaṁ taṁ vihatabyāpajjatāya
atk-abh02a12:9_3: abyāpajjaṁ. Tasmā “yaṁ vipulaṁ taṁ mahaggata”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Avero abyāpajjoti cettha
atk-abh02a12:9_4: liṅgavipariyāyena vuttaṁ. Manena vā saddhiṁ yojanā kātabbā – yaṁ appamāṇaṁ cittaṁ,
atk-abh02a12:9_5: so avero mano; yo avero so abyāpajjoti. Apicettha heṭṭhimaṁ heṭṭhimaṁ padaṁ uparimassa
atk-abh02a12:9_6: uparimassa, uparimaṁ vā uparimaṁ heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa atthotipi veditabbo.
atk-abh02a12:10_0: 653.Seyyathāpi nāma ekaṁ puggalaṁ duggataṁ durupetanti idampi karuṇāya vatthubhūtaṁ
atk-abh02a12:10_1: puggalaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ. Evarūpasmiñhi puggale balavakāruññaṁ uppajjati. Tattha
atk-abh02a12:10_2: duggatanti dukkhena samaṅgībhāvaṁ gataṁ. Durupetanti kāyaduccaritādīhi upetaṁ. Gatikulabhogādivasena
atk-abh02a12:10_3: vā tamabhāve ṭhito puggalo duggato, kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve
atk-abh02a12:11_0: 663.Ekaṁ puggalaṁ piyaṁ manāpanti idampi muditāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ dassetuṁ
atk-abh02a12:11_1: vuttaṁ. Tattha gatikulabhogādivasena jotibhāve ṭhito piyo, kāyasucaritādīhi upetattā
atk-abh02a12:12_0: 673.Neva manāpaṁ na amanāpanti idampi upekkhāya vatthubhūtaṁ puggalaṁ dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a12:12_1: Tattha mittabhāvaṁ asampattatāya neva manāpo, amittabhāvaṁ asampattatāya na amanāpoti
atk-abh02a12:12_2: veditabbo. Sesamettha yaṁ vattabbaṁ siyā, taṁ sabbaṁ heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe vuttameva.
atk-abh02a12:12_3: Bhāvanāvidhānampi etesaṁ kammaṭṭhānānaṁ visuddhimagge vitthārato kathitamevāti.
atk-abh02a12:15: Abhidhammabhājanīyaṁ kusalatopi vipākatopi kiriyatopi heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe bhājitanayeneva bhājitaṁ. Atthopissa tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a12:17_0: Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva mettādīnaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo. Ārammaṇattikesu
atk-abh02a12:17_1: pana sabbāpi tīsu tikesu navatabbārammaṇā eva. Ajjhattārammaṇattike bahiddhārammaṇāti.
atk-abh02a12:17_2: Imasmiṁ pana appamaññāvibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena suttantabhājanīyepi lokiyā eva appamaññāyo
atk-abh02a12:17_3: kathitā, abhidhammabhājanīyepi pañhāpucchakepi. Tayopi hi ete nayā lokiyattā ekaparicchedā
atk-abh02a12:17_4: eva. Evamayaṁ appamaññāvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
